author: Special Correspondent
text:
The 16th The Hindu Young World Quiz will be conducted at SNR Auditorium at SNR Sons College here on January 27.

It will be hosted by quizmaster V.V. Ramanan. The competition has been one of the biggest and most popular one to be organised in the city. It will be held under two categories.

For students from Standard IV to VI, the quiz will begin at 10 a.m. Registrations for this category will be opened at 9 a.m.

The contest for students from Standard VII to IX is scheduled to commence at 2 p.m. Registrations for this category will be open from 1 p.m. Teams consisting of two members from a school can take part in the quiz by registering on the spot or by prior registration at The Hindu office, 19 and 20, ATT Colony, LIC Road – Coimbatore 6410 18. The last day for prior registration is January 25. Any number of teams from the same school can compete in the quiz.

This year’s edition is sponsored by Vellore Institute of Technology. Firefox is the national sponsor of the event. For further information, R. Amarnath can be contacted at 90039-13286 from Coimbatore district. The contact numbers for Salem, Erode and Namakkal district schools are 0427 3001003 and 3001 002. Online registrations are open atwww.thehindu.com/ywquiz.
title: The Hindu Young World Quiz on January 27
